thread.title: Google’s 2016 Bad Ads Report: 1.7 billion ads removed, including fake news ads
thread.title_full: Google’s 2016 Bad Ads Report: 1.7 billion ads removed, including fake news ads

author: Ginny Marvin
title: Google’s 2016 Bad Ads Report: 1.7 billion ads removed, including fake news ads
text:
The company says efforts to crack down on payday loan ads, ads that look like system errors and "tabloid cloaking" ads were among those that led to an increase in removed ads in 2016. The post Google’s 2016 Bad Ads Report: 1.7 billion ads removed, including fake news ads appeared first on...

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
